## \_createReducer variable

Helper function that creates a reducer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
_createReducer: <TState, TAction extends StateAction<string>>(type: TAction["type"], reducerFn: ReducerFn<TState, TAction>) => Reducer<TState, TAction>
```
